edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course

Class Activity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Course, Event

    public abstract class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents activities that can be added to a schedule. Subclasses include courses and events.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

      • setActivityTime

        public void setActivityTime(int startTime,
                            int endTime)
        Sets the startTime and the endTime for the Activity
        Parameters:
        startTime - the starting time of the Activity
        endTime - the ending time of the Activity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if meetingDays is A and the start time and end time are not both 0, if the start time and end time are not between 0 and 2359, if the minutes are not between 0 and 59, or if the start time is greater than the end time

      • isDuplicate

        public abstract boolean isDuplicate(Activity activity)
        Used for determining whether or not an Activity is a duplicate of another Activity. The criteria for whether an Event or a Course is a duplicate is described in the different implementations of the method in the two subclasses
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity to compare
        Returns:
        true if the Activities are duplicates, false otherwise
